  • Method Details

    • toggleCloseButton

      public void toggleCloseButton()
      Toggles the visibility of the close button on the window.

    • close

      public void close()
      Closes the window by simulating a click on the close button.

    • setTitle

      public void setTitle(String title)
      Sets the title of the window.
      Parameters:
      String - title - The new title for the window.

    • setPosition

      public void setPosition(haven.Coord pos)
      Sets the position of the window to the specified coordinates.
      Parameters:
      jCoord - pos - The new position for the window.

    • setSize

      public void setSize(haven.Coord size)
      Resizes the window to the specified dimensions.
      Parameters:
      jCoord - size - The new size of the window.

    • getTitle

      public String getTitle()
      Retrieves the text of the window.
      Returns:
      A String containing the text of the window.

    • getPosition

      public haven.Coord getPosition()
      Retrieves the (top left) position of the window.
      Returns:
      A Coord containing the position of the window.

    • getSize

      public haven.Coord getSize()
      Retrieves the size of the window.
      Returns:
      A Coord containing the size of the window.

    • waitButtonClick

      public String waitButtonClick(int timeout)
      Waits for a button click in the window, with an optional timeout.
      Parameters:
      Integer - timeout - The maximum time to wait for a button click, in milliseconds. If set to 0, the method will wait indefinitely for a button click.
      Returns:
      A String containing the text of the button that was clicked, or an empty String if no button was clicked within the timeout.

    • waitButtonClick

      public String waitButtonClick()
      Overloaded method for existing scripts, waits indefinitely for a button click.
      Returns:
      A String containing the text of the button that was clicked.
